trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.RendererChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.RendererChanged" /> .

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse tipo.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripContentPanelBackground> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripContentPanelBackground> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância de um tipo que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>, como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>.

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripRenderer1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripContentPanelBackground> event.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, nomear a instância `ToolStripRenderer1` e certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripContentPanelBackground> evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> representing the GDI+ drawing surface.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> que representa a superfície de desenho GDI+.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" /> to render.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" /> a ser renderizado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object to use for drawing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto a ser usado para o desenho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to use for drawing.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> para usar para o desenho.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripRenderer1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripContentPanelBackground?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event was handled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o evento foi tratado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event was handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o evento foi manipulado, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.
